thread.title: China's PV power capacity to hit 150 gigawatts by 2020 (Beijing Municipal Government)
thread.title_full: China's PV power capacity to hit 150 gigawatts by 2020 (Beijing Municipal Government) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: China's PV power capacity to hit 150 gigawatts by 2020 (Beijing Municipal Government)
text: ( Source : Beijing Municipal Government ) China's photovoltaic (PV) power capacity will hit 150 gigawatts by 2020, said a senior official on Tuesday. Dong Xiufen, director of the new energy office with National Energy Administration ( NEA ),
